Package eu.focusnet.app.ui.fragment.widget

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BarChartWidgetFragment
    A Fragment rendering a Pie Chart widget, using MPAndroidChart

    FIXME very similar to BarChartWidget -> modularize?
    CameraWidgetFragment
    Fragment to render an image capture widget.
    EmptyWidgetFragment
    Fragment rendering of an empty widget.
    ExternalAppFragment
    Fragment rendering an external application launcher widget
    FormWidgetFragment
    Fragment rendering a form widget, with different field types.
    GPSWidgetFragment
    A Fragment rendering the GPS coordinates fetching form widget.
    Html5WidgetFragment
    A Fragment rendering a webapp inside a WebView.
    InvalidWidgetFragment
    Fragment rendering a dummy content for widgets that are not properly configured.
    LineChartWidgetFragment
    A Fragment rendering a Pie Chart widget, using MPAndroidChart

    FIXME very similar to BarChartWidget -> modularize?
    PieChartWidgetFragment
    A Fragment rendering a Pie Chart widget, using MPAndroidChart
    SubmitWidgetFragment
    Fragment displaying a submit button widget.
    TableWidgetFragment
    A Fragment that renders a table widget.
    TextWidgetFragment
    A Fragment displaying a simple TextView, which possibly contains HTML markup.
    WidgetFragment
    Abstract class representing an UI widget.
